list.meaning: O Allah, open the gates of Your mercy for me
O Allah, I ask You from Your favor.
list.reference: Al-Hâkim (1/218), Al-Baihaqî (2/442) and Al-Albânî declared it ĥasan in Silsilah Al-Ahâdîth Aŝ-Ŝaĥîĥah [2478](5/624)

list.dua: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَعُوذُ بِكَ مِنَ الْخُبْثِ وَالْخَبَائِثِ
list.meaning: O Allah, I take refuge with you from all evil and evil-doers

list.dua: بِسْمِ اللهِ، تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَى اللهِ، وَلاَحَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللهِ
list.meaning: In the name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, and there is no might nor power except with Allah.

list.dua: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ وَلَجْنَا، وَبِسْمِ اللَّهِ خَرَجْنَا، وَعَلَى اللهِ رَبَّنَا تَوَكَّلْنَا
list.meaning: In the name of Allah we enter and in the name of Allah we leave, and upon our Lord we place our trust.
